DOC.brief_summary: SCUBA dive frequently involve repetitive exposure multiple day . The goal study see exercise impact microparticles ( MPs ) , endothelial function , venous gas embolus ( VGE ) series dive . 16 diver 2 group complete 6 dive . One group complete 3 control dive follow 5 day rest 3 dive precede exercise . The group complete opposite protocol . Flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) data blood MP analysis collect dive . VGE monitor via transthoracic echocardiography 30 , 60 , 90 min surfacing . Exercise diving consist 60 min run outdoors include 8x4 min interval 90 % VO2max effort .
DOC.criteria: Certified SCUBA diver Certified dive experience Medical evaluator Must able run continuously 45 min Prior diagnosis decompression sickness
